Monterey_Park.Old LA (Highland Park) Farmers Market: The Old LA Certified Farmers Market (OLACFM) operates in the Highland Park neighborhood of Los Angeles, CA. The farmers market is open every Tuesday from 3PM to dusk year round. One of the newest certified farmers markets in the Los Angeles area, the market opened in April 2006 and serves Highland Park and other neighborhoods in Northeast Los Angeles, including Mt. Washington, Eagle Rock,(Glassel Park, Los Angeles ) and Montecito Heights.
